values: If something is ideological, it is based on a system of beliefs or ideals, especially those that relate to a government or economy.
The citizens of England had ideological differenes about its government.
adj. 观念学的;意识形态的;思想体系的
adj. 观念学的;意识形态的;思想体系的
adj. 思想的；意识形态的
adj. 思想的；意识形态的
意识形态的， 思想体系的； 思想上的
adj. 思想的；意识形态的
adj. 思想的；意识形态的
